about_the_game:
Enhance five Ara: History Untold Leaders (Ashoka, Elizabeth I, George Washington, Sappho and Yaa) with the Gilded Leader Skin Set, featuring golden versions of their in-game costumes.

Receive the Gilded Leader Skin Set with pre-order of the Standard, Deluxe and Premium Editions
detailed_description:
Enhance five Ara: History Untold Leaders (Ashoka, Elizabeth I, George Washington, Sappho and Yaa) with the Gilded Leader Skin Set, featuring golden versions of their in-game costumes.

Receive the Gilded Leader Skin Set with pre-order of the Standard, Deluxe and Premium Editions
name: Ara: History Untold, Gilded Leader Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Processor: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 – Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 – Intel i5-6400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 64 – Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

esrb.descriptors:
Mild Violence
Alcohol Reference
Use of Tobacco

short_description: Receive the Gilded Leader Skin Set with pre-order of the Standard, Deluxe and Premium Editions
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish, Vietnamese, Malay
*languages with full audio support
